Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Olive Oil
Butter
White Onion and wash
Ground Gingers and wash
5 Garlic Cloves
Tomato Pastes
Water
Chicken Thigh Packages
Gram Masala
Paprika
Sugar
Cumin
Turmeric
Salt
Black Pepper
Coconut Cream

Recipe

Preheat Instant Pot with Saute setting
Dice white onion
Dice garlic
Cut chicken into 1 inch cubes
Add 1 tbsp Olive Oil and 1 tbsp Butter
Add White Onion and 2 tbsps Ground Gingers and 5 Garlic Cloves
Wait 4 minutes Sear
Add 6 ounces Tomato Pastes
Wait 3 minutes Constantly stir
Put ½ cup Water in instant pot
Put 2 pounds Chicken Thigh Packages in instant pot
Add spice 1 tbsp Gram Masala
Add spice 1 tsp Paprika
Add spice 1 tbsp Sugar
Add spice 1 tsp Cumin
Add spice ½ tsp Turmeric
Add spice 1 tsp Salt
Add spice 1 tsp Black Pepper
Wait 5 minutes Cook on high pressure
Wait 10 minutes Let it slow release
Stir in ¾ cup Coconut Cream
